# 1
```{r}
#' This function 
#'
#'
#'
#'
pgauss<- function(x, mean, var){
  cdf<-rep(NA, length(x))
  for(i in 1:length(x)){
    cdf[i]<-integrate(f=function(x) dnorm(x, mean=mean, sd=sqrt(var)), lower=-Inf, upper=x[i])[[1]]
  
  }
    return(cdf)
}

```

# 2
```{r}
1 - pgauss(3, 1, 2)

1- pnorm(3, mean=1, sd=sqrt(2))

```
